attributes.action: sack all MP's who have made fraudulent expences claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call for all MP’s, including the speaker, who are found by an independent review body to have made and received fraudulent expense claims which are shown to be for personal gain rather than legitimate costs for doing their job, to be instantly sacked with no financial recompense, and all of these expenses paid back immediately. This is what happens out in the ‘real world’ and MP’s should not be exempt from this.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
